Miriam Lord is a colour writer and columnist with The irish Times.
Roisin Ingle is a journalist for The Irish Times contributing features, news, colour and a weekly column in the Saturday magazine
Ross O'Carroll Kelly is a satirical finctional Irish character, a wealthy Dublin 4 rugby union jock created by journalist Paul Howard.
Conor Pope is The Irish Times Consumer Affairs Correspondent and edits the Pricewatch Column.
Fintan O'Toole is literary editor of The Irish Times and has been an op-ed columnist since 1988.
Michael Harding is a playwright and novelist.
